%% Tables de routages des diffÃ©rents routeurs.

R 192.168.1.254 1 
L 192.168.2.254 2 255.255.255.255 i0 100  
L 192.168.3.254 3 255.255.255.255 i0 100  


R 192.168.2.254 2 
L 192.168.1.254 1 255.255.255.255 i0 100  
L 192.168.3.254 3 255.255.255.255 i0 100  


R 192.168.3.254 3 
L 192.168.1.254 1 255.255.255.255 i0 100  
L 192.168.2.254 2 255.255.255.255 i0 100
